Articles.Content:
This mission report is a detailed mission log from Badger Industries Sector 9, which is in charge of all anomalies discovered by the company. I will post as I make progress in the save file. Most of the anomalies are fictional or bugs I have discovered in the game, so don't go looking for them (you won't find them).

PART 1:

DATE: Year 2, Day 175

Mun Base Centauri AI Report:

00:00: Status: Nominal

01:00: Status: Nominal

02:00: Status: Nominal

03:00: Status: Nominal

04:00: Status: Nominal

05:00: Status: Nominal

06:00: Status: Nominal

07:00: Status: Nominal

07:18: Status: Signal Detected

07:19: Status: Nominal

3 days later...

Assistant: "Sir, Gene is here. He says he needs to speak with you immediately."

Thomrod: "Ok. You can let him in."

-Door opens-

Gene: "Good morning sir."

Thomrod: "Hey Gene, what's up?"

Gene: "Do you remember the Mun Anomaly Incident?"

-Gene hands Thomrod a video card playing this:

-

Thomrod: "Yes. We found an anti-gravity mun spot, blah blah blah, built Mun Base Centauri at the site, and nothing has come out of it. That was over a year ago. Why have you come?"

Gene: "There was an incident at the base."

Thomrod: "Dear Kod... Is everyone alright?!?"

Gene: "Yes, it was non-lethal. Ervey Kerman, the engineer on board Mun Base Centauri, fell asleep at the coms station. The coms dish began to swerve away from kerbin. Then he woke up, reestablished coms with us, and checked for damage. Everything is alright now."

Thomrod: "Ok. That's good. Any other news?"

Gene: "Let me continue. The AI started acting up, saying there was an urgent message from us. When Ervey checked the message, he found that it was received when the dish was pointed, how do I put this... at the site of the anomaly."

Thomrod: "Hold on just a minute, your saying.."

Gene: "We may have definitive proof of life from either another world in the Kerbol system or outside of it."

Edited August 7, 2014 by SelectHalfling0

PART 2:

DATE: Year 2, Day 179

Beta Station AI Report:

09:00: Status: Nominal

10:00: Status: Nominal

11:00: Status: Nominal

11:41: Status: Signal Detected

11:42: Status: Nominal

12:00: Status: Nominal

Ellie: "Hansen, anything to report?"

Hensen: "Nope. Everything looks fine out here."

Ellie: "Huh. The nuts back home kept saying 'watch out for low orbital debris!' and yet we haven't been hit once since the station went up! Well, you can come back inside now."

Hensen: "Copy that commander."

Melgun: "Hey, commander? We are picking up a signal operating at the same frequency as emergency broadcasts as KSC."

Ellie: "Well bring it up NOW!"

-Static is heard-

Ellie: "KSC, KSC, do you copy?"

-Static is heard-

Ellie: "Trace the signal. I hope it isn't one of the mun bases playing a prank on us."

Melgun: "Got it. It's coming from... Dear Kod!"

Ellie: "What?!?!"

Melgun: "The signal is coming from anomaly #1"

Ellie: "The anti-grav mun spot..."
